mapper.sql: ID, NAME, ACCOUNT, MOBILE, EMAIL, SEX, PASSWORD, DEPT_ID, LAST_PASSWORD_RESET_DATE, IS_DELETE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from user_tab
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user_tab (NAME, ACCOUNT, MOBILE, EMAIL, SEX, PASSWORD, DEPT_ID, LAST_PASSWORD_RESET_DATE, IS_DELETE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastPasswordResetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update user_tab
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNT = #{record.account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{record.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_ID = #{record.deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LAST_PASSWORD_RESET_DATE = #{record.lastPasswordResetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DELETE = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update user_tab set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT = #{record.account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{record.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_ID = #{record.deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAST_PASSWORD_RESET_DATE = #{record.lastPasswordResetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DELETE = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}

NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},

UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_tab set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAST_PASSWORD_RESET_DATE = #{lastPasswordResetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.ID, t1. NAME, t1.ACCOUNT, t1.MOBILE, t1.EMAIL, t1.SEX, t1. PASSWORD, t1.DEPT_ID, t1.LAST_PASSWORD_RESET_DATE, t1.IS_DELETE, t1.CREATE_TIME, t1.CREATE_USER, t1.UPDATE_TIME, t1.UPDATE_USER, t2. NAME AS DEPTNAME, t4. NAME AS POSTNAME FROM user_tab t1 LEFT JOIN dept_tab t2 ON t1.dept_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN user_post_rela t3 ON t3.USER_ID = t1.ID LEFT JOIN post_tab t4 ON t4.ID = t3.POST_ID WHERE t1.ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
